Name: Katrina
description: Katrina is 30 years old and married with five children. She makes and sells elei printed material and hand-made carved furniture to earn a living and has been doing this for five years. Katrina has requested a loan to buy a compound saw, timber, plywood, 10 cans of varnish, material, 10 cans of fabric paint and rollers. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. She joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to financial services.
